alert.note: Alert for Clay; Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 11:32AM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Rain and Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Norman and Clay Counties. In North Dakota, Richland County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are expected. The hazardous conditions will impact evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
